## QuaternaryPlot class

Legacy class to draw quaternary composition plots.

Use [QuaternaryShellPlot](./composition-plot.quaternaryshellplot.md) for new projects

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class QuaternaryPlot 
```
